meanings.definition: A man who is married to one's parent but is not one's biological father.
meanings.sent1: My stepdads always support me and make me feel loved.
meanings.sent2: She invited her stepdads to her school play.
meanings.sent3: The stepdads at the family picnic were all joking around and having a great time.
meanings.sent4: In the story, the stepdads of the forest protected the young animals from harm.
meanings.sent5: The kind stepdads welcomed the new puppy with open arms.
